thread.title: Design-Pro Tricks to Beautify Your Home for $100 or Less

author: Catherine Romano
title: Design-Pro Tricks to Beautify Your Home for $100 or Less
text:
Interior designers often lack experience when it comes to extreme skimping. After all, they’re working with clients who can afford to hire a design professional and usually have plenty to spend. 

“Most of the items we use in our work cost thousands, not hundreds, of dollars,” said Mountain Brook, Ala., architect Jeffrey Dungan of the plush rugs, rare woods and investment art his team installs. When asked to suggest an under-$100 décor upgrade or two, Mr. Duncan looked to a home that operates on a much more modest budget:...
